overview: It's summer, and the sun is shining. Thats good, of course, but it isn't the only reason for the boys in this horned-up escapade to get mega-excited. Because now school's out there's every good reason and opportunity to have some serious fun - and we're not talking playing footie! No, the likes of Jaxon Radoc, Jaden Fox and Connor Levi have much more intimate ways of passing the hottest days of the year; exploring the contents of each other's shorts, and enjoying every single throbbing inch that they discover inside them. No question folks, if you like cute lads banging bareback in the great outdoors - not to mention inside! - then you're in for a treat; as the boys from Prague smash their way through another spunk-loaded season!

production_companies.name: Orrange Media Group: Young and Restless

title: School's Out: Let's Have Fun
